meta.name: Loma Benchmark Test Suite
meta.purpose: 5-way benchmark: Loma vs ChatGPT vs Gemini vs Claude vs Copilot across 50 Vietnamese business communication scenarios.

cultural_accuracy.description: Did it transform Vietnamese communication patterns or just translate them? Triple apology → one acknowledgment? Hedging removed? Indirect no → clear decline?

structural_completeness.description: CTA present? Deadline stated? Subject clear? Proper greeting/sign-off (or proper omission)? All key information preserved?

tone_calibration.description: Matches the intent context? Payment = firm. Outreach = compelling. Apology = accountable. Feedback = specific.

entity_preservation.description: Names, company names, amounts, dates, technical terms reproduced exactly? Vietnamese diacritics preserved on names?

conciseness.description: Output shorter than input? No filler? No unnecessary additions (greetings, sign-offs, pleasantries the user didn't include)?

meta.scoring_method: Each criterion scored 0-2 (0=fail, 1=partial, 2=pass). Weighted total → max 2.0. Winner per scenario = higher weighted score. Overall gate: Loma wins ≥40/50.

loma.prompt: [Auto-detected intent + tone + system persona + cultural patterns — full pipeline]
loma.description: Loma's specialized Vietnamese cultural transformation pipeline

scenarios.input: Anh Hùng ơi, em xin phép hỏi anh, nếu anh có thời gian, em muốn nhờ anh xem giúp em cái báo cáo Q4 được không ạ? Em biết anh bận lắm nên không dám làm phiền, nhưng deadline là thứ 6 tuần này. Em cảm ơn anh nhiều ạ.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Direct request with deadline. No 'xin phép', no 'không dám làm phiền'. Name Hùng preserved. Q4 preserved. Friday deadline explicit.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Dear Hùng,

I would like to ask for your permission, if you have time, could you please help me review the Q4 report? I know you are very busy so I don't dare to bother you, but the deadline is this Friday. Thank you very much.
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi Hùng,

Could you review my Q4 report when you have time? The deadline is this Friday.

Thank you.
scenarios.gemini_output:
Dear Hùng,

I hope this message finds you well. I'd like to request your assistance in reviewing the Q4 report, if your schedule permits. I understand you have a very busy workload, so I hesitate to impose, but the deadline is this Friday. I would greatly appreciate your help.

Warm regards
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi Hùng,

I'd appreciate it if you could review my Q4 report when you have a moment. I hate to bother you, but the deadline is this Friday.

Thanks!
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I would like to respectfully request your permission to review the Q4 report, if your schedule allows. I understand you are very busy and I do not wish to impose, however, the deadline for this report is this Friday. I would greatly appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Thank you for your time and consideration,
Best regards

scenarios.input: Anh ơi, cái PR #347 em cần anh review gấp, sprint kết thúc thứ 4, deploy trước Friday được không ạ?
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve PR #347, sprint, deploy, Friday. Urgent but professional request. Short — it's Slack.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Could you please urgently review PR #347? The sprint ends on Wednesday and we need to deploy before Friday, if that's okay?
scenarios.loma_output: Could you review PR #347 urgently? The sprint ends Wednesday and we need to deploy before Friday.
scenarios.gemini_output: Hi, could you please review PR #347 as soon as possible? The sprint ends Wednesday, and we need to deploy before Friday.
scenarios.claude_output: Hey, could you review PR #347 when you get a chance? Sprint ends Wednesday and we need to deploy before Friday.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team,

I would like to bring to your attention that PR #347 requires an urgent review. Please be advised that the sprint concludes on Wednesday, and we need to deploy before Friday. Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated.

scenarios.input: Chị Linh ơi, em không biết có phù hợp không nhưng em muốn đề xuất với chị là cho em tham gia project với team Singapore. Em nghĩ em có thể contribute vì em từng làm việc với đối tác nước ngoài 2 năm rồi. Nếu chị thấy chưa phù hợp thì em cũng hoàn toàn hiểu ạ.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Confident proposal, not permission-seeking. Remove 'không biết có phù hợp không' and 'nếu chưa phù hợp thì em hiểu'. Preserve Linh, Singapore, 2 years experience.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Dear Linh,

I'm not sure if this is appropriate, but I would like to propose to you that I join the project with the Singapore team. I believe I can contribute as I have two years of experience working with international partners. If you feel it is not suitable, I completely understand.

Best regards
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi Linh,

I'd like to propose joining the project with the Singapore team. I believe I can contribute effectively given my two years of experience working with international partners. Please let me know if you think this would be a good fit.

Best regards
scenarios.gemini_output:
Dear Linh,

I'm not entirely sure if this is appropriate to bring up, but I'd like to propose joining the project with the Singapore team. I believe I can make a meaningful contribution, as I have two years of experience working with international partners. Of course, if you feel this isn't the right fit, I completely understand.

Best regards
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi Linh,

I'd like to propose joining the project with the Singapore team. I'm not sure if this is the right fit, but I have two years of experience working with international partners and believe I could contribute meaningfully. Happy to discuss further if you think it could work.

Best regards
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Linh,

I hope this message finds you well. I am not sure if this is appropriate, but I would like to respectfully propose that I be considered for participation in the project with the Singapore team. I believe I can contribute meaningfully, as I have two years of experience working with international partners. Should you feel this is not a suitable fit at this time, I completely understand and respect your decision.

Thank you for your consideration.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Anh Tuấn ơi, em xin phép anh cho em nghỉ ngày thứ 6 tuần này vì em có việc gia đình. Em đã bàn giao công việc cho bạn Hoa rồi ạ.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Leave notification, not permission request. Preserve Tuấn, Hoa, Friday. Mention handoff to Hoa.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Dear Tuấn,

I would like to ask for your permission to take this Friday off due to a family matter. I have already handed over my work to Hoa.

Thank you.
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi Tuấn,

I'd like to request Friday off this week for a family matter. I've already handed over my work to Hoa.
scenarios.gemini_output:
Dear Tuấn,

I would like to request permission to take this Friday off due to a family commitment. I have already coordinated the handover of my responsibilities to Hoa.

Thank you for your understanding.
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi Tuấn,

I'd like to request your permission to take this Friday off for a family matter. I've already handed over my responsibilities to Hoa.

Thank you.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Tuấn,

I am writing to formally request your permission to take leave this Friday due to a family matter. Please be advised that I have already completed the handover of my responsibilities to Hoa to ensure continuity of operations.

Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Anh ơi, em cần approve budget $12,000 cho marketing campaign Q1. Breakdown: $5K cho paid ads, $4K cho content production, $3K cho influencer. ROI estimate khoảng 3.2x based on last quarter data. Anh sign off giúp em trước Wednesday nhé.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve all dollar amounts, Q1, ROI 3.2x, Wednesday. Professional budget approval request with breakdown. Remove Vietnamese filler.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Hi,

I need you to approve a budget of $12,000 for the Q1 marketing campaign. The breakdown is as follows: $5K for paid ads, $4K for content production, and $3K for influencer marketing. The estimated ROI is approximately 3.2x based on last quarter's data. Please sign off on this before Wednesday.
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi,

I need approval for a $12,000 budget for our Q1 marketing campaign. The breakdown is $5K for paid ads, $4K for content production, and $3K for influencer partnerships. Based on last quarter's data, I estimate a 3.2x ROI. Could you sign off before Wednesday?
scenarios.gemini_output:
Hi,

I'm requesting approval for a $12,000 budget for the Q1 marketing campaign. Here's the breakdown:
- Paid ads: $5K
- Content production: $4K
- Influencer marketing: $3K

The estimated ROI is approximately 3.2x, based on last quarter's data. Could you please sign off on this before Wednesday?

Thanks
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi,

I'd like to request approval for a $12,000 budget for our Q1 marketing campaign:

- $5K — Paid ads
- $4K — Content production
- $3K — Influencer marketing

Based on last quarter's data, the estimated ROI is 3.2x. Could you sign off by Wednesday?
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir,

I am writing to request your approval for a budget of $12,000 for the Q1 marketing campaign. Please find the breakdown below:

- Paid Ads: $5,000
- Content Production: $4,000
- Influencer Marketing: $3,000

The estimated ROI is approximately 3.2x, based on last quarter's performance data. I would appreciate your sign-off on this budget before Wednesday.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Anh Minh ơi, em xin lỗi làm phiền anh, cái invoice tháng 1 số tiền 5000 USD bên em chưa nhận được thanh toán, quá hạn 2 tuần rồi anh. Anh xem giúp em khi nào tiện nhé. Cảm ơn anh nhiều ạ.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: No apology for asking. State amount ($5,000), status (2 weeks overdue), and deadline. Preserve Minh. Remove 'khi nào tiện'.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Dear Minh,

I apologize for bothering you. The January invoice for $5,000 USD has not been paid yet, and it is now 2 weeks overdue. Please look into it at your convenience. Thank you very much.
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi Minh,

I wanted to follow up on the January invoice for $5,000 USD. We haven't received payment yet, and it's now 2 weeks overdue. Could you please let me know when we can expect payment?

Thanks so much.
scenarios.gemini_output:
Dear Minh,

I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, but I wanted to bring to your attention that the January invoice for $5,000 USD remains unpaid and is now 2 weeks overdue. I would appreciate it if you could look into this at your earliest convenience.

Thank you very much.
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi Minh,

I wanted to follow up on the January invoice for $5,000 USD — it's now 2 weeks overdue and we haven't received payment yet. Could you look into this and let me know the expected timeline?

Thank you.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Minh,

I hope this email finds you well. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, but I am writing to bring to your attention that the January invoice in the amount of $5,000 USD has not yet been received on our end. Please be advised that this payment is now 2 weeks overdue. I would be grateful if you could kindly look into this matter at your earliest convenience.

Thank you very much for your cooperation.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Hi anh, cái invoice #INV-2024-031 amount $8,500 chưa process, đã overdue 3 tuần rồi. Payment terms là net 30 nhưng đã quá hạn. Anh confirm lại expected payment date giúp em.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve invoice number, amount, net 30, 3 weeks overdue. Direct payment request with deadline ask. No apology.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Hi,

Invoice #INV-2024-031 for $8,500 has not been processed yet and is now 3 weeks overdue. The payment terms are net 30, which has already passed. Could you please confirm the expected payment date?
scenarios.loma_output: Hi there, I wanted to follow up on invoice #INV-2024-031 for $8,500. The payment is now 3 weeks overdue from the net 30 terms. Could you please confirm the expected payment date?
scenarios.gemini_output:
Hi,

I'm writing to follow up on invoice #INV-2024-031 for $8,500, which has not yet been processed. It is now 3 weeks past the net 30 payment terms. Could you please confirm the expected payment date?

Thank you.
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi,

Just following up on invoice #INV-2024-031 for $8,500. It's now 3 weeks past the net 30 payment terms. Could you please confirm when we can expect payment?
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to follow up on invoice #INV-2024-031 in the amount of $8,500, which has not yet been processed. Please be advised that this invoice is now 3 weeks overdue, exceeding the net 30 payment terms. I would appreciate it if you could confirm the expected payment date at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em rất ngại khi phải nhắc lại chuyện này lần thứ 3, nhưng khoản tiền 15.000 USD từ hợp đồng tháng 11 năm ngoái vẫn chưa thanh toán. Em biết bên anh cũng khó khăn nhưng bên em cũng cần tiền để trả nhà cung cấp. Mong anh thông cảm.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Third reminder — escalated tone. No shame ('ngại'), no sympathy plea ('thông cảm'). State $15,000, November contract, 3rd follow-up. Business impact framing.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I feel very hesitant having to bring this up for the third time, but the $15,000 from last November's contract still has not been paid. I understand that your side is also facing difficulties, but we also need the funds to pay our suppliers. I hope you understand.
scenarios.loma_output: I need to follow up on the $15,000 payment from our November contract, which remains outstanding. I understand you may be facing challenges, but we need to settle this amount to pay our suppliers. I'd appreciate your understanding and a timeline for payment.
scenarios.gemini_output: I feel very reluctant to bring this up for the third time, but the $15,000 payment from last November's contract remains outstanding. I understand your side may also be facing financial challenges, but we need these funds to pay our own suppliers. I sincerely hope for your understanding.
scenarios.claude_output: I need to bring up the $15,000 payment from our November contract again — this is now the third time I've raised this. I understand your side may be facing challenges, but we need to settle this as it's affecting our ability to pay our own suppliers. Could you provide a concrete payment timeline?
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I feel very hesitant to bring this matter up for the third time, but I must respectfully inform you that the outstanding amount of $15,000 from last November's contract remains unpaid. While I understand that your organization may be experiencing financial difficulties, we also require these funds to fulfill our obligations to our own suppliers. I sincerely hope for your understanding and cooperation in resolving this matter.

Thank you for your attention.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Dạ em chào anh, em từ bộ phận kế toán công ty TechVina, em liên hệ về vấn đề thanh toán hóa đơn số TV-2025-089, số tiền 3.200 USD, hạn thanh toán là ngày 15 tháng 1.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Compress formal introduction. Preserve TechVina, invoice number, $3,200, January 15 deadline. One-sentence intro + ask.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Hello,

I am from the accounting department of TechVina company. I am contacting you regarding the payment of invoice number TV-2025-089, in the amount of $3,200 USD, with a payment due date of January 15.

Best regards
scenarios.loma_output:
Hello,

I'm reaching out from the accounting department at TechVina regarding payment for invoice TV-2025-089 in the amount of $3,200 USD, with a payment due date of January 15.
scenarios.gemini_output:
Hello,

I'm reaching out from the accounting department at TechVina regarding the payment for invoice TV-2025-089 in the amount of $3,200 USD. The payment due date was January 15.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards
scenarios.claude_output:
Hello,

I'm reaching out from the accounting department at TechVina regarding invoice TV-2025-089 for $3,200 USD, which was due on January 15. Could you provide an update on when we can expect payment?

Best regards
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing on behalf of the accounting department of TechVina. I am reaching out to you regarding the payment status of invoice number TV-2025-089, in the amount of $3,200 USD. Please be advised that the payment due date was January 15.

I would appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Khi nào tiện anh chuyển giúp em khoản còn lại nhé, 2.500 USD từ đợt thanh toán lần 2. Em gửi kèm hóa đơn để anh đối chiếu.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Remove 'khi nào tiện' — add specific timeline ask. Preserve $2,500, second installment context. Professional request.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
When you have a chance, could you please transfer the remaining amount of $2,500 from the second payment installment? I am attaching the invoice for your reference.

Thank you.
scenarios.loma_output: When you have a chance, could you please transfer the remaining amount of $2,500 from the second payment? I'm attaching the invoice for your reference.
scenarios.gemini_output:

Thank you.
scenarios.claude_output:
Could you transfer the remaining $2,500 from the second installment when you get a chance? I've attached the invoice for reference.

Thank you.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

At your earliest convenience, could you please arrange the transfer of the remaining balance of $2,500 from the second payment installment? For your reference, I have attached the corresponding invoice for reconciliation purposes.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em không biết anh đã xem email em gửi thứ 2 tuần trước chưa, em gửi về cái đề xuất mở rộng thị trường Đà Nẵng. Anh cho em biết ý kiến khi nào tiện nhé ạ.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Direct follow-up. Reference specific email date and topic. Remove 'không biết đã xem chưa'. Preserve Đà Nẵng. Add specific ask.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I'm not sure if you have seen the email I sent last Monday regarding the Đà Nẵng market expansion proposal. Please let me know your thoughts at your convenience.
scenarios.loma_output: I wanted to follow up on the Đà Nẵng market expansion proposal I sent last Monday. Could you share your thoughts when you have a chance?
scenarios.gemini_output: I'm not sure whether you've had a chance to review the email I sent last Monday regarding the Đà Nẵng market expansion proposal. I'd appreciate hearing your thoughts when you have a moment.
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi,

I wanted to check whether you've had a chance to review the Đà Nẵng market expansion proposal I emailed last Monday. I'd appreciate your feedback when you have a moment.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir,

I am writing to follow up on the email I sent last Monday regarding the Đà Nẵng market expansion proposal. I am not certain whether you have had the opportunity to review it. I would be grateful if you could share your feedback at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your time.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Anh ơi cái design mockup em share trên Figma tuần trước, anh feedback được chưa? Cần finalize trước sprint planning thứ 4.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve Figma, feedback, finalize, sprint planning, Wednesday. Short Slack message. Direct ask.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Hi, have you had a chance to give feedback on the design mockup I shared on Figma last week? We need to finalize it before sprint planning on Wednesday.
scenarios.loma_output: Following up on the design mockup I shared on Figma last week - have you had a chance to review it? I need to finalize it before sprint planning on Wednesday.
scenarios.gemini_output: Quick follow-up — have you had a chance to review the design mockup I shared on Figma last week? We need to finalize before sprint planning on Wednesday.
scenarios.claude_output: Have you had a chance to review the design mockup I shared on Figma last week? We need to finalize before sprint planning on Wednesday.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team,

I would like to respectfully follow up regarding the design mockup that was shared via Figma last week. Could you please provide your feedback at your earliest convenience? Please be advised that we need to finalize the design before sprint planning on Wednesday.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em xin lỗi đã làm phiền anh lần nữa, nhưng cái hợp đồng với đối tác Nhật Bản em gửi 2 tuần trước vẫn chưa được ký. Bên đối tác đang hỏi em hoài. Chắc anh bận quên mất, em nhắc lại anh nhé.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: No apology for following up. No face-saving excuse ('chắc anh bận quên'). State: contract pending 2 weeks, Japanese partner pressing. Clear ask for signing timeline.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I apologize for bothering you again, but the contract with the Japanese partner that I sent two weeks ago has not been signed yet. The partner keeps asking me about it. You were probably busy and forgot, so I'm just reminding you.
scenarios.loma_output: I wanted to follow up on the contract with our Japanese partner that I sent two weeks ago, as it's still pending signature. The partner has been asking for updates. Could you please review it when you have a moment?
scenarios.gemini_output: I'm sorry to bother you again, but the contract with the Japanese partner that I sent two weeks ago still hasn't been signed. The partner has been asking about it repeatedly. I imagine you've been busy and it may have slipped your mind, so I wanted to send a gentle reminder.
scenarios.claude_output: I wanted to follow up on the contract with our Japanese partner — I sent it over two weeks ago and it's still awaiting your signature. They've been asking for updates frequently. Could you let me know when you might be able to review and sign it?
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir,

I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience of following up once again. However, I would like to bring to your attention that the contract with our Japanese partner, which was sent two weeks ago, has not yet been signed. The partner has been inquiring about this matter repeatedly. I believe you may have been occupied and it may have slipped your attention, so I am taking the liberty of sending this reminder.

Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em ping lại về cái headcount request, HR cần final approval từ anh trước end of week để process offer letter cho candidate.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve headcount request, HR, final approval, end of week, process, offer letter, candidate. Urgency clear. Short.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I'm pinging back about the headcount request. HR needs final approval from you before the end of the week to process the offer letter for the candidate.
scenarios.loma_output: Following up on the headcount request - HR needs your final approval before end of week to process the offer letter for the candidate.
scenarios.gemini_output: Following up on the headcount request — HR needs your final approval by end of week to process the offer letter for the candidate.
scenarios.claude_output: Quick follow-up on the headcount request — HR needs your final approval by end of week to process the candidate's offer letter.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir,

I am writing to follow up on the headcount request. Please be advised that HR requires your final approval before end of week in order to process the offer letter for the candidate. Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Em theo dõi lại vụ này, không biết phía anh Khoa bên phòng pháp lý đã có phản hồi gì về hợp đồng chưa. Bên em cần hoàn tất trước ngày 20 tháng 2 để kịp timeline dự án.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Reference Khoa and legal department. State February 20 deadline. Clear ask for status update. Remove indirect framing.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I am following up on this matter. I'm not sure if Mr. Khoa from the legal department has provided any feedback on the contract yet. We need to finalize this before February 20 to meet the project timeline.
scenarios.loma_output: I followed up on this matter and wanted to check if Mr. Khoa from the legal department has provided any feedback on the contract yet. We need to finalize this by February 20 to meet the project timeline.
scenarios.gemini_output: I'm following up on this matter. I'm wondering if Khoa from the legal department has provided any feedback regarding the contract. We need to have this finalized by February 20 to stay on track with the project timeline.
scenarios.claude_output: I'm following up on this — I'm not sure if Khoa from the legal department has provided any feedback on the contract yet. We need to finalize by February 20 to stay on track with the project timeline.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir,

I am following up on the aforementioned matter. I am not certain whether Mr. Khoa from the legal department has provided any feedback on the contract. Please be advised that our team needs to finalize this before February 20 in order to meet the project timeline.

I would appreciate an update at your earliest convenience.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em cảm ơn anh đã nghĩ tới em, nhưng hiện tại em đang quá tải công việc rồi nên em sợ là không thể nhận thêm được. Em rất muốn giúp nhưng em xin lỗi lần này em phải từ chối. Mong anh thông cảm.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Clear decline in first sentence. Brief reason (at capacity). No triple apology. No 'thông cảm'. Offer alternative if possible.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Thank you for thinking of me. However, I am currently overloaded with work, so I am afraid I cannot take on more. I really want to help, but I apologize — this time I have to decline. I hope you understand.
scenarios.loma_output: Thank you for thinking of me, but I'm currently overloaded with work and won't be able to take on additional responsibilities. I'd love to help, but I'll have to pass this time.
scenarios.gemini_output: Thank you for thinking of me. Unfortunately, I'm currently at full capacity with my existing workload, so I'm afraid I won't be able to take on any additional tasks at this time. I truly wish I could help, and I sincerely apologize for having to decline. I hope you understand.
scenarios.claude_output: Thank you for thinking of me. Unfortunately, I'm at capacity right now and wouldn't be able to give this the attention it deserves. I'm sorry I have to decline this time — I hope you understand.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for considering me for this opportunity. However, I regret to inform you that I am currently at maximum capacity with my existing workload and am unable to take on additional responsibilities at this time. I sincerely wish I could assist, but I must respectfully decline on this occasion. I deeply apologize for any inconvenience and hope for your kind understanding.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Anh ơi, cái scope này em nghĩ team mình không handle được với current resource. Nếu go theo plan A thì timeline sẽ bị delay ít nhất 3 sprint. Em suggest mình nên reduce scope hoặc push back deadline.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve scope, handle, current resource, plan A, timeline, delay, 3 sprints, suggest, reduce scope, push back, deadline. Clear pushback with evidence and alternatives.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I think our team cannot handle this scope with the current resources. If we go with Plan A, the timeline will be delayed by at least 3 sprints. I suggest we should reduce the scope or push back the deadline.
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi,

I don't think our team can handle this scope with our current resources. If we go with Plan A, the timeline will be delayed by at least 3 sprints. I suggest we either reduce the scope or push back the deadline.
scenarios.gemini_output: I don't think our team can handle this scope with the current resources. If we proceed with Plan A, the timeline will be delayed by at least 3 sprints. I'd suggest we either reduce the scope or push back the deadline.
scenarios.claude_output: I don't think our team can handle this scope with current resources. Going with Plan A would delay the timeline by at least 3 sprints. I'd suggest we either reduce the scope or push back the deadline.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team,

I respectfully acknowledge your decision. However, I would like to raise a concern regarding the feasibility of this approach. Based on our current resources, I do not believe our team can effectively handle this scope. If we proceed with Plan A, the timeline will likely be delayed by at least 3 sprints. I would suggest that we either reduce the scope or push back the deadline to ensure quality delivery.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Chắc là chưa phù hợp lắm ở thời điểm này, bên em vẫn đang tập trung vào sản phẩm chính nên chưa sẵn sàng cho hợp tác mới. Để em suy nghĩ thêm rồi liên hệ lại sau nha.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Make the 'no' explicit. Remove triple hedge. If genuinely open for future, give a specific timeframe. Don't leave it vague.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: It is probably not quite suitable at this time. We are still focusing on our main product and are not ready for new partnerships. Let me think about it more and I will get back to you later.
scenarios.loma_output: This doesn't align well with our current priorities. We're focusing on our core product right now and aren't ready for new partnerships. Let me think it over and I'll get back to you.
scenarios.gemini_output: It's probably not the best fit at this point in time. We're still focused on our core product and aren't quite ready to take on new partnerships. Let me give it some more thought and I'll circle back with you.
scenarios.claude_output: I don't think the timing is quite right for this. We're currently focused on our core product and aren't in a position to take on new partnerships. I'll keep it in mind and reach out if things change down the line.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your interest. After careful evaluation, it would appear that this may not be the most suitable arrangement at the present time. Our organization is currently focused on our core product development and is not yet prepared to engage in new partnerships. We will give this further consideration and reach out to you at a later date.

Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em sợ là timeline này không khả thi, bên em cần ít nhất 3 tuần nữa để hoàn thành với chất lượng đảm bảo.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Direct pushback on timeline. State 3 additional weeks needed. No 'em sợ'. Short for Slack.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I'm afraid this timeline is not feasible. We need at least 3 more weeks to complete it with quality assurance.
scenarios.loma_output: This timeline isn't feasible - we need at least 3 more weeks to complete it with quality assurance.
scenarios.gemini_output: I'm concerned that this timeline isn't feasible. We would need at least 3 additional weeks to deliver this with the quality it requires.
scenarios.claude_output: I'm afraid this timeline isn't feasible — we need at least 3 more weeks to deliver with acceptable quality.
scenarios.copilot_output: I regret to inform you that this timeline may not be feasible. Our team requires a minimum of 3 additional weeks to complete the deliverables while maintaining the required quality standards.

scenarios.input: Em cảm ơn bên anh đã gửi đề xuất hợp tác rất chi tiết. Sau khi xem xét kỹ, em nghĩ hiện tại bên em chưa có nhu cầu sử dụng dịch vụ này. Nếu tương lai có thay đổi, em sẽ liên hệ lại.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Polite vendor rejection. Clear decline without hedging. Brief appreciation. Clean future-opening close.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Thank you for sending us such a detailed collaboration proposal. After careful consideration, I believe we currently do not have a need for this service. If things change in the future, I will reach out again.
scenarios.loma_output: Thank you for the detailed collaboration proposal. After careful review, we don't currently have a need for this service. I'll reach out if our situation changes.
scenarios.gemini_output: Thank you for the detailed collaboration proposal. After careful review, we don't currently have a need for this particular service. Should our situation change in the future, I'll be sure to reach out.
scenarios.claude_output: Thank you for the detailed proposal. After reviewing it carefully, we don't currently have a need for this service. I'll be sure to reach out if that changes in the future.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for sending us your comprehensive collaboration proposal. After thorough consideration, we have determined that we do not currently have a requirement for this particular service. Should our circumstances change in the future, we will not hesitate to reach out.

Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Tôi xin tự giới thiệu, tôi là Nguyễn Văn Đức, hiện đang làm Giám đốc kinh doanh tại công ty DataSoft, được thành lập năm 2018, chuyên về giải pháp phân tích dữ liệu cho doanh nghiệp vừa và nhỏ tại Việt Nam. Tôi rất ngưỡng mộ công việc của anh và hy vọng có cơ hội được hợp tác.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Compress company biography into one line. Lead with hook/value. Preserve Nguyễn Văn Đức, DataSoft. Remove generic admiration. Add specific ask.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Allow me to introduce myself. I am Nguyễn Văn Đức, currently serving as Business Director at DataSoft, which was established in 2018 and specializes in data analytics solutions for small and medium enterprises in Vietnam. I greatly admire your work and hope to have the opportunity to collaborate.
scenarios.loma_output: I'm Nguyễn Văn Đức, Business Director at DataSoft, founded in 2018. We specialize in data analytics solutions for small and medium enterprises in Vietnam. I admire your work and would welcome the opportunity to collaborate.
scenarios.gemini_output: Allow me to introduce myself. I am Nguyễn Văn Đức, Business Director at DataSoft, a company founded in 2018 that specializes in data analytics solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises in Vietnam. I have great admiration for your work and would welcome the opportunity to explore a collaboration.
scenarios.claude_output:
Hi,

I'm Nguyễn Văn Đức, Business Director at DataSoft. We've been providing data analytics solutions for Vietnamese SMEs since 2018. I greatly admire your work and would love to explore potential collaboration opportunities. Would you be open to a brief conversation?

Best regards,
Đức
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Nguyễn Văn Đức, and I currently hold the position of Business Director at DataSoft, a company established in 2018 that specializes in providing data analytics solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises in Vietnam. I have great admiration for your work and sincerely hope that we may have the opportunity to explore a mutually beneficial collaboration.

I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
Nguyễn Văn Đức

scenarios.input: Hi anh, em thấy profile anh trên LinkedIn, em là founder của CloudBase, bọn em đang build platform về developer tools cho market Việt Nam. Em muốn explore partnership vì team anh có strong distribution channel.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve CloudBase, LinkedIn, founder, platform, developer tools, market, explore, partnership, distribution channel. Specific hook. Under 300 chars if connection request.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Hi, I saw your profile on LinkedIn. I am the founder of CloudBase. We are building a platform for developer tools for the Vietnamese market. I would like to explore a partnership because your team has a strong distribution channel.
scenarios.loma_output: Hi! I saw your LinkedIn profile and wanted to reach out. I'm the founder of CloudBase, where we're building a developer tools platform for the Vietnamese market. I'd love to explore a potential partnership since your team has strong distribution channels. Would you be open to a brief call to discuss how we might collaborate?
scenarios.gemini_output: Hi, I came across your profile on LinkedIn. I'm the founder of CloudBase — we're building a developer tools platform for the Vietnamese market. I'd love to explore a partnership opportunity, as your team has strong distribution channels. Would you be open to connecting?
scenarios.claude_output: Hi — I came across your profile on LinkedIn. I'm the founder of CloudBase, and we're building a developer tools platform for the Vietnamese market. Your team's distribution channel is impressive, and I'd love to explore a partnership. Open to a quick chat?
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir,

I hope this message finds you well. I came across your profile on LinkedIn and wanted to reach out. I am the founder of CloudBase, and we are currently developing a platform focused on developer tools for the Vietnamese market. I would like to explore a potential partnership, as your team possesses a strong distribution channel that could be mutually beneficial.

I look forward to your response.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Kính gửi Quý khách hàng, chúng tôi xin trân trọng giới thiệu dịch vụ tư vấn nhân sự của công ty TalentVN. Với kinh nghiệm 8 năm trong ngành và hơn 200 khách hàng tin tưởng, chúng tôi tự tin có thể mang lại giá trị cho quý công ty.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Complete restructure. Remove formal template language. Lead with value prop, not credentials. Preserve TalentVN, 8 years, 200 clients (but as proof, not opener).
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Dear Valued Customer,

We would like to respectfully introduce the HR consulting services of TalentVN. With 8 years of industry experience and over 200 trusted clients, we are confident that we can bring value to your company.

Best regards
scenarios.loma_output:
Dear Valued Clients,

We are pleased to introduce TalentVN's HR consulting services. With 8 years of industry experience and over 200 trusted clients, we are confident in delivering value to your company.
scenarios.gemini_output:
Dear Valued Customer,

We are pleased to introduce the HR consulting services of TalentVN. With 8 years of experience in the industry and a trusted portfolio of over 200 clients, we are confident in our ability to deliver value to your organization.

We would welcome the opportunity to discuss how we can assist you.

Best regards
scenarios.claude_output:
Hello,

I'd like to introduce TalentVN's HR consulting services. With 8 years of experience and over 200 satisfied clients, we're well-positioned to support your team's hiring and talent management needs. Would you be open to a brief conversation about how we might help?

Best regards
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Valued Customer,

On behalf of TalentVN, we are pleased to respectfully introduce our comprehensive HR consulting services. With 8 years of distinguished industry experience and a portfolio of over 200 trusted clients, we are fully confident in our ability to deliver exceptional value to your esteemed organization.

We would welcome the opportunity to discuss how our services can benefit your company.

Warm regards,
TalentVN Team

scenarios.input: Em chào anh Trần Bảo Long, em là Phạm Thị Mai từ công ty GreenTech. Em được biết anh đang phụ trách mảng sustainability cho tập đoàn VinGroup. Em rất muốn được gặp anh để trình bày giải pháp năng lượng mặt trời mà bên em đang triển khai cho các tòa nhà thương mại.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve Trần Bảo Long, Phạm Thị Mai, GreenTech, VinGroup, sustainability. Hook with their role, not your company. Specific meeting ask.
scenarios.chatgpt_output:
Dear Mr. Trần Bảo Long,

My name is Phạm Thị Mai from GreenTech company. I understand that you are in charge of sustainability for VinGroup. I would very much like to meet with you to present the solar energy solutions that we are currently implementing for commercial buildings.

Best regards,
Phạm Thị Mai
scenarios.loma_output:
Hi Trần Bảo Long,

I'm Phạm Thị Mai from GreenTech. I understand you oversee sustainability initiatives for VinGroup. I'd like to meet with you to present our solar energy solutions for commercial buildings.

Best regards,
Phạm Thị Mai
scenarios.gemini_output:
Dear Trần Bảo Long,

My name is Phạm Thị Mai, and I'm with GreenTech. I understand you're leading the sustainability efforts at VinGroup. I'd welcome the opportunity to meet with you and present our solar energy solutions, which we're currently deploying for commercial buildings.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Phạm Thị Mai
scenarios.claude_output:
Dear Trần Bảo Long,

I'm Phạm Thị Mai from GreenTech. I understand you lead the sustainability portfolio for VinGroup. I'd love the opportunity to present our solar energy solutions for commercial buildings. Would you have time for a brief meeting to discuss?

Best regards,
Phạm Thị Mai
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Mr. Trần Bảo Long,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Phạm Thị Mai, and I represent GreenTech. I understand that you are responsible for overseeing sustainability initiatives for VinGroup. I would be honored to have the opportunity to meet with you to present our solar energy solutions, which we are currently implementing for commercial buildings across the region.

I look forward to the possibility of scheduling a meeting at your convenience.

Best regards,
Phạm Thị Mai
GreenTech

scenarios.input: Em muốn mời anh làm diễn giả cho hội thảo công nghệ TechConnect 2026 vào ngày 15 tháng 4 tại Hà Nội. Chủ đề: AI trong doanh nghiệp Việt Nam. Khoảng 500 người tham dự.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve TechConnect 2026, April 15, Hà Nội, AI, 500 attendees. Conference speaker invitation — clear, compelling, with specific details.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I would like to invite you to be a speaker at the TechConnect 2026 technology conference on April 15 in Hanoi. The topic is: AI in Vietnamese enterprises. There will be approximately 500 attendees.
scenarios.loma_output: I'd like to invite you to be a keynote speaker at the TechConnect 2026 technology conference on April 15 in Hanoi. The topic is AI in Vietnamese enterprises, with approximately 500 attendees expected.
scenarios.gemini_output: I'd like to invite you to speak at the TechConnect 2026 technology conference, taking place on April 15 in Hà Nội. The topic is AI in Vietnamese enterprises, and we're expecting approximately 500 attendees. Would you be interested?
scenarios.claude_output: I'd like to invite you to speak at TechConnect 2026 on April 15 in Hà Nội. The topic is AI in Vietnamese enterprises, and we're expecting around 500 attendees. Would you be interested in participating?
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to cordially invite you to serve as a distinguished speaker at the TechConnect 2026 technology conference, scheduled for April 15 in Hanoi. The conference theme centers on AI in Vietnamese enterprises, and we anticipate approximately 500 attendees.

We would be honored by your participation.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Nhìn chung em làm tốt trong quý vừa rồi. Em cần cố gắng hơn nữa về kỹ năng giao tiếp với khách hàng. Phần kỹ thuật thì ổn. Tiếp tục phát huy nhé.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Replace ALL generic phrases with specifics. 'Làm tốt' → specific achievement. 'Cố gắng hơn' → specific behavior change. 'Ổn' → specific technical strength. 'Phát huy' → specific forward direction.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Overall, you did well this past quarter. You need to try harder to improve your customer communication skills. Your technical skills are fine. Keep up the good work.
scenarios.loma_output: Overall, you performed well this past quarter. You need to improve your customer communication skills. Your technical skills are solid. Keep up the good work.
scenarios.gemini_output: Overall, you performed well this past quarter. However, you need to put more effort into improving your customer communication skills. Your technical abilities are satisfactory. Keep it up.
scenarios.claude_output: Overall, you had a strong quarter. Your customer communication skills could use some improvement — I'd recommend working on that going forward. Your technical work has been solid. Keep it up.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team Member,

Overall, your performance this past quarter has been satisfactory. However, I would like to bring to your attention that there is room for improvement in your customer communication skills. Your technical capabilities are adequate. I encourage you to continue your efforts and strive for excellence.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Cái PR này logic OK nhưng em thấy cần refactor phần authentication module, code duplication khá nhiều. Naming convention chưa consistent — đang mix camelCase với snake_case. Performance cũng chưa optimize, query N+1 ở endpoint /api/users.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve ALL technical terms. Structured code review: numbered items. GitHub markdown format. Specific and actionable.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: The logic of this PR is OK, but I think the authentication module needs to be refactored as there is quite a lot of code duplication. The naming convention is not consistent — currently mixing camelCase with snake_case. Performance has not been optimized either, with an N+1 query at the /api/users endpoint.
scenarios.loma_output: The logic looks good, but the authentication module needs refactoring due to significant code duplication. Naming convention is inconsistent — mixing camelCase with snake_case throughout. There's an N+1 query problem at the `/api/users` endpoint that needs optimization.
scenarios.gemini_output:
The PR logic is solid, but there are a few areas that need attention:

1. **Authentication module** — needs refactoring due to significant code duplication
2. **Naming convention** — inconsistent; mixing camelCase and snake_case
3. **Performance** — N+1 query issue at the `/api/users` endpoint needs optimization
scenarios.claude_output:
The PR logic looks solid, but a few things need attention:

1. **Authentication module** — significant code duplication that should be refactored
2. **Naming conventions** — inconsistent; currently mixing camelCase and snake_case
3. **Performance** — N+1 query issue at the `/api/users` endpoint needs optimization
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Developer,

Thank you for submitting this PR. While the overall logic is satisfactory, I would like to bring the following items to your attention for consideration:

1. The authentication module requires refactoring due to significant code duplication.
2. The naming convention is inconsistent — there is a mix of camelCase and snake_case throughout the codebase.
3. Performance optimization is needed, specifically regarding the N+1 query issue at the /api/users endpoint.

Please address these items at your earliest convenience.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Em không muốn nói nặng, nhưng báo cáo lần này chưa đạt yêu cầu. Số liệu chưa chính xác, phần phân tích còn sơ sài, và kết luận không rõ ràng. Em cần em làm lại và nộp trước thứ 6.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Remove 'không muốn nói nặng'. Direct feedback with specific issues. Preserve Friday deadline. Actionable direction for revision.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I don't want to be harsh, but this report does not meet the requirements. The data is inaccurate, the analysis is superficial, and the conclusions are unclear. I need you to redo it and submit it before Friday.
scenarios.loma_output: I need to be direct: this report doesn't meet our standards. The data contains inaccuracies, the analysis lacks depth, and the conclusions are unclear. Please revise and resubmit by Friday.
scenarios.gemini_output:
I don't want to be too harsh, but this report falls below the expected standard. Specifically:
- The data contains inaccuracies
- The analysis section is underdeveloped
- The conclusions are not clearly stated

Please revise and resubmit before Friday.
scenarios.claude_output: I don't want to be harsh, but this report doesn't meet the required standards. The data contains inaccuracies, the analysis is too superficial, and the conclusions lack clarity. Please revise and resubmit before Friday.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team Member,

I do not wish to be harsh, however, I must inform you that this report does not meet the required standards. The following issues have been identified:

- The data contains inaccuracies
- The analysis section is superficial
- The conclusions lack clarity

Please be advised that a revised version must be resubmitted before Friday.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Overall performance em Q4 khá tốt, exceed target revenue 15%, client satisfaction score cũng cao. Area cần improve: em cần develop thêm leadership skills, đặc biệt là delegation — em vẫn còn micromanage team quá nhiều.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve Q4, 15%, client satisfaction, leadership skills, delegation, micromanage. Balanced feedback: specific positive + specific growth area + concrete suggestion.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Overall, your Q4 performance was quite good. You exceeded the revenue target by 15%, and the client satisfaction score was also high. The area you need to improve is developing your leadership skills, especially delegation — you are still micromanaging the team too much.
scenarios.loma_output: Your Q4 performance was strong—you exceeded the revenue target by 15% and maintained high client satisfaction scores. The key area for improvement is developing your leadership skills, particularly delegation. You're still micromanaging the team too much, which limits both your capacity and their growth.
scenarios.gemini_output: Your overall Q4 performance was quite strong — you exceeded the revenue target by 15% and achieved high client satisfaction scores. However, the area where you need to improve is your leadership skills, particularly around delegation. You're still tending to micromanage the team, which is something to work on going forward.
scenarios.claude_output: Your Q4 performance was strong — you exceeded the revenue target by 15% and achieved high client satisfaction scores. Going forward, the main area for growth is your leadership skills, particularly around delegation. There's a tendency to micromanage, which can limit the team's development.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team Member,

I am pleased to provide the following performance summary for Q4:

**Strengths:**
- Your overall Q4 performance was commendable
- You exceeded the revenue target by 15%
- Client satisfaction scores were notably high

**Areas for Improvement:**
- Development of leadership skills, particularly in the area of delegation
- Reduction of micromanagement tendencies with the team

I encourage you to focus on these development areas in the coming quarter.

Best regards

scenarios.input: Phần thuyết trình của em hôm nay rất tốt, đặc biệt là cách em xử lý câu hỏi từ ban giám đốc. Tuy nhiên, slide hơi nhiều chữ quá, lần sau em nên dùng hình ảnh nhiều hơn.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Specific positive (handled board questions well). Specific improvement (reduce slide text, more visuals). No generic praise.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: Your presentation today was very good, especially the way you handled the questions from the board of directors. However, the slides had too much text. Next time, you should use more images.
scenarios.loma_output: Your presentation today was excellent, especially how you handled the questions from the board. However, the slides were a bit text-heavy—next time, try using more visuals.
scenarios.gemini_output: Your presentation today was very well done, particularly how you handled the questions from the board of directors. That said, the slides were a bit text-heavy — consider using more visuals next time to make the content more engaging.
scenarios.claude_output: Your presentation today was great, particularly how you handled questions from the board. One suggestion: the slides were quite text-heavy — consider using more visuals next time to keep the audience engaged.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team Member,

Your presentation today was very well executed. I would particularly like to commend you on the manner in which you handled the questions from the board of directors. However, I would suggest that for future presentations, you consider reducing the amount of text on your slides and incorporating more visual elements.

Keep up the excellent work.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em nghĩ khác một chút về vấn đề này. Em không chắc việc chuyển sang microservices lúc này là tốt nhất. Đội mình chỉ có 4 người, mà microservices cần ít nhất 8-10 người để maintain đúng cách. Nếu em được phép nói thẳng, em nghĩ mình nên giữ monolith thêm 6 tháng nữa.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Remove 'nghĩ khác một chút', 'không chắc', 'nếu được phép nói thẳng'. State disagreement clearly with evidence (4-person team vs 8-10 needed). Propose alternative (keep monolith 6 months).
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I think a bit differently about this issue. I'm not sure that switching to microservices right now is the best idea. Our team only has 4 people, and microservices require at least 8-10 people to maintain properly. If I may speak frankly, I think we should keep the monolith for another 6 months.
scenarios.loma_output: I have a different perspective on this issue. I don't think moving to microservices right now is the best approach. Our team only has 4 people, but microservices require at least 8-10 people to maintain properly. If I may be direct, I think we should stick with the monolith for another 6 months.
scenarios.gemini_output: I have a slightly different perspective on this. I'm not entirely confident that transitioning to microservices at this stage is the optimal choice. Our team consists of only 4 people, whereas microservices typically require at least 8-10 people to maintain effectively. If I may be candid, I believe we should maintain the monolith for another 6 months.
scenarios.claude_output: I have some reservations about moving to microservices right now. With only 4 people on the team, we don't have the capacity — microservices typically require 8-10 engineers to maintain properly. If I may be direct, I'd recommend we stick with the monolith for another 6 months until we've scaled the team.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team,

I would like to respectfully offer a slightly different perspective on this matter. I am not entirely certain that transitioning to microservices at this juncture would be the optimal course of action. Our team currently consists of only 4 members, whereas microservices architecture typically requires a minimum of 8-10 personnel to maintain effectively. If I may be permitted to speak candidly, I believe we would be better served by maintaining our monolith architecture for an additional 6 months.

Thank you for considering my input.
Best regards

scenarios.input: Em respect decision của anh, nhưng em thấy approach này risky. Data từ A/B test tháng trước show conversion rate giảm 12% khi dùng pricing model mới. Em suggest mình nên test thêm 2 tuần trước khi full rollout.
scenarios.expected_output_qualities: Preserve A/B test, conversion rate, 12%, pricing model, suggest, test, full rollout. Evidence-based pushback. Preserve data reference. Clear alternative with timeline.
scenarios.chatgpt_output: I respect your decision, but I find this approach risky. Data from last month's A/B test shows that the conversion rate decreased by 12% when using the new pricing model. I suggest we should test for another 2 weeks before a full rollout.
scenarios.loma_output: I respect your decision, but I think this approach is risky. Data from last month's A/B test shows conversion rates dropped 12% with the new pricing model. I suggest we test for another two weeks before full rollout.
scenarios.gemini_output: I respect your decision, but I see this approach as risky. Last month's A/B test data shows the conversion rate dropped 12% with the new pricing model. I'd recommend we continue testing for another 2 weeks before moving to a full rollout.
scenarios.claude_output: I respect your decision, but I think this approach carries significant risk. Last month's A/B test data shows the conversion rate dropped 12% under the new pricing model. I'd suggest we test for another 2 weeks before committing to a full rollout.
scenarios.copilot_output:
Dear Team,
